column4: For some reason, I can't get my computer to boot the Ubuntu CD. Is there any other way that I can install Ubuntu on that machine?
do you have windows installed on that machine?
i read something about being able to install ubuntu from windows, but i have no idea if it is still experimental
Do you mean this? http://ubuntu.wordpress.com/2007/01/17/about-the-ubuntu-installer-for-windows/ It looks like that will install Ubuntu on my Windows partition. Not really what I'm after.
